thread.title: Vrbata, Burrows score in shootout as Canucks spoil Ducks’ home opener
thread.title_full: Vrbata, Burrows score in shootout as Canucks spoil Ducks’ home opener

author: Greg Beacham
title: Vrbata, Burrows score in shootout as Canucks spoil Ducks’ home opener
text:
Vancouver Canucks centre Brandon Sutter moves the puck against Anaheim Ducks center Andrew Cogliano during the third period at Honda Center. (Gary A. Vasquez/USA Today Sports) Vrbata, Burrows score in shootout as Canucks spoil Ducks’ home opener Greg Beacham Anaheim, Calif. — The Associated Press 
Published Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015 6:13AM EDT 
Last updated Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015 6:14AM EDT 
Ryan Miller and the Vancouver Canucks have already found a groove just three games into the regular season. The Anaheim Ducks are still looking for a way to get their offence going. 
Radim Vrbata and Alex Burrows scored in the shootout, and the Canucks spoiled Anaheim’s home opener with a 2-1 victory Monday night. connect with us The Globe and Mail Newspaper
